targets.expr:
sum(rate(fastly_rt_hits_total{service_name=~"$service_name", service_id=~"$service_id", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[$rate])) / (sum(rate(fastly_rt_hits_total{service_name=~"$service_name", service_id=~"$service_id", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[$rate]))
+ sum(rate(fastly_rt_miss_total{service_name=~"$service_name", service_id=~"$service_id", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[$rate])))

sum(rate(fastly_rt_status_group_total{service_name=~"$service_name",service_id=~"$service_id", status_group="5xx", datacenter=~"$datacenter"}[30s])) by (datacenter) / sum(rate(fastly_rt_requests_total{service_name=~"$service_name", service_id=~"$service_id", datacenter=~"$datacenter",}[$rate])) by (datacenter)
